title: Bolsonaro's rule is 'worse threat than coronavirus,' say Brazilians as nation passes 500,000 deaths
content:
1. Bolsonaro's rule is 'worse threat than coronavirus,' say Brazilians as nation passes 500,000 deaths  CNN
  2. Anti-Bolsonaro protests held across Brazil over pandemic policy | DW News  DW News
  3. Brazil passes half a million COVID-19 deaths, experts warn of worse ahead  Yahoo India News
  4. Brazilian heavyweights set to go head-to-head  Kathimerini English Edition
  5. Virus Outbreak: News and Analysis From June 19  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: ボルソナロ政権は「コロナウイルスよりもひどい脅威」とブラジル人が指摘 死者数50万人突破で話題に
巴西人说博尔索纳罗的统治是 "比冠状病毒更可怕的威胁"，因为全国死亡人数超过50万
巴西人說博爾索納羅的統治是 "比冠狀病毒更可怕的威脅"，因爲全國死亡人數超過50萬
